RTCIceTransportGetSelectedCandidatePair.summary: The getSelectedCandidatePair() method of the interface returns an object containing the current best-choice pair of {{Glossary("ICE")}} candidates describing the configuration of the endpoints of the transport.
RTCIceTransportGetSelectedCandidatePair.returns:
A object describing the configurations of the currently-selected candidate pair's two endpoints.
describes the configuration of the local end of the connection, while describes the remote peer's configuration.The return value is null if no pair of candidates has been selected yet.
